t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Inactive brand with no trademark has all the asins We use
s: We attempted long ago to trademark our brand name and registered our brand in brand registry however our trademark was denied due to the name being too common and so our brand registration went into inactive status however we have continued to list products with out issue for years now.

t: Listing inactive pending brand approval but i have approval?
s: I started selling on a new listing. I sent 12 units into Amazon FC and they became active yesterday. After about 1 hour on the listing, it became inactive because I needed brand approval. I clicked the "request approval" button where prompted and was taken to a page that says "Request approved".

t: My listing suddenly became inactive for no reason
s: My listing has been up and running for over a year under a brand that i own under copyright. About 3 days ago the listing suddenly became inactive and i was informed by amazon support that i will be required to get approval to continue selling the product.

t: Inactive Listings | Adobe Commerce 2.3 User Guide
